ingredients:
Ingredients:
- 2 large tomatoes
- 2 chicken breasts
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 cup bread crumbs
- 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped
- 1 cup marinara sauce
- Cooking spray
instructions:
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the tomatoes into thick slices and set them aside.
3. Season each chicken breast with salt and pepper on both sides.
4. In a shallow dish, combine the breadcrumbs with the grated Parmesan cheese.
5. Dredge each chicken breast in flour, shaking off any excess.
6. Dip the floured chicken breasts into the beaten eggs, then coat them with the breadcrumb and Parmesan mixture.
7. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the breaded chicken breasts and cook for about 4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown
